name: CreateBoardTag
description:
Create a tag on a Miro board.

This tool is used to create a tag on a specified Miro board. It should be called when there's a need to organize or categorize elements on a board by adding a new tag.

parameters.name: board_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the Miro board where the tag will be created.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board where you want to create the tag.

parameters.name: tag_title
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive text for the tag.

value_schema.description: Text of the tag. Case-sensitive. Must be unique.

parameters.name: tag_fill_color
parameters.description: The fill color of the tag. Choose from options: red, light_green, cyan, yellow, magenta, green, blue, gray, violet, dark_green, dark_blue, black.
